line.words: Maman a mal à la tête.

subtitle.line: Moeder heeft hoofdpijn
Mum Has a Headache.
Mum Has a Headache.
Mum Has a Headache.
Mamá tiene dolor de cabeza.
Mor har hovedpine.
Mum Has a Headache.

line.words: Tayo a une guitare et il va chanter. §Je préfère la pop musique et le reggae,§ dit-il.

subtitle.line: Taco heeft een gitaar en hij begint te zingen. “Ik houd van popmuziek en reggae”, zegt hij.
Tayo has a guitar and he is going to sing. “I prefer pop and reggae music,” he says.
Tayo has a guitar and he is going to sing. “I prefer pop and reggae music,” he says.
Tayo has a guitar and he is going to sing. “I prefer pop and reggae music,” he says.
Tayo tiene una guitarra y va a cantar “prefiero la música pop a la música reggae” dice.
Tayo har en guitar, og han skal til at synge. ”Jeg kan bedst lide pop og reggae”, siger han.
Tayo has a guitar and he is going to sing. “I prefer pop and reggae music,” he says.

line.words: Lila a une flûte à bec. Elle va fredonner. §J’aimerais jouer du jazz,§ dit-elle. §C’est super.§

subtitle.line: Lisa heeft een blokfluit. Ze begint te neuriën. “Ik zou graag jazz spelen”, zegt ze. “Dat is super.”
Lila has a recorder. She is going to hum. “I would like to play jazz,” she says. “It’s super.”
Lila has a recorder. She is going to hum. “I would like to play jazz,” she says. “It’s super.”
Lila has a recorder. She is going to hum. “I would like to play jazz,” she says. “It’s super.”
Lila tiene una grabadora. Va a tararear “me gustaría tocar jazz”, dice “es fenomenal.”
Lila har en optager. Hun skal til at nynne. ”Jeg kunne godt tænke mig at spille jazz”, siger hun. ”Det er fedt”.
Lila has a recorder. She is going to hum. “I would like to play jazz,” she says. “It’s super.”

line.words: Sol et Ruben ont un violon et un saxophone. Ils vont siffler. §Est-ce-que tu aimes la samba et le rock?§ dit Sol. §Non, je n’aime pas,§ dit Ruben. §C’est nul.§

subtitle.line: Sol en Ruben hebben een viool en een saxofoon. Ze beginnen te fluiten. “Houd jij van samba en rockmuziek?” vraagt Sol. “Nee, ik vind dat niet mooi,” zegt Ruben, “het is waardeloos.”
Sol and Reuben have a violin and a saxophone. They are going to whistle. “Do you like samba and rock music?” says Sol. “No, I don’t like it,” says Reuben, “it’s rubbish.”
Sol and Reuben have a violin and a saxophone. They are going to whistle. “Do you like samba and rock music?” says Sol. “No, I don’t like it,” says Reuben, “it’s rubbish.”
Sol and Reuben have a violin and a saxophone. They are going to whistle. “Do you like samba and rock music?” says Sol. “No, I don’t like it,” says Reuben, “it’s rubbish.”
Sol y Rubén tienen un violín y un saxofón. Van a silvar “¿te gusta la samba y la música rock?” dice Sol. “No, no me gusta”, dice Rubén, “es una basura.”
Sol og Reuben har en violin og en saxofon. De skal til at fløjte. ”Kan du lide samba og rockmusik?”, siger Sol. ”Nej, det kan jeg ikke lide”, siger Reuben, ”det er noget bras”.
Sol and Reuben have a violin and a saxophone. They are going to whistle. “Do you like samba and rock music?” says Sol. “No, I don’t like it,” says Reuben, “it’s rubbish.”

line.words: Rohan et Mala ont une batterie et une trompette. Ils vont frapper des pieds et des mains. §Qui aime le rap et la techno?§ crie Rohan. §Moi j’aime bien,§ murmure Mala. §C’est génial.§

subtitle.line: Johan en Maria hebben een drumstel en een trompet. Ze beginnen te stampen en klappen. “Wie houdt er van rapmuziek en techno?” roept Johan. “Ik,” fluistert Maria, “het is geweldig.”
Rohan and Mala have drums and a trumpet. They are going to stamp and clap. “Who likes rap and techno music?” shouts Rohan. “I like it,” whispers Mala. “It’s great.”
Rohan and Mala have drums and a trumpet. They are going to stamp and clap. “Who likes rap and techno music?” shouts Rohan. “I like it,” whispers Mala. “It’s great.”
Rohan and Mala have drums and a trumpet. They are going to stamp and clap. “Who likes rap and techno music?” shouts Rohan. “I like it,” whispers Mala. “It’s great.”
Rohan y Mala tienen tambores y trompetas. Van a golpear el suelo con los pies y a tocar las palmas “¿A quién le gusta la música techno?” grita Rohan. §Me gusta”, susurrea Mala. “Es genial.”
Rohan og Mala har trommer og en trompet. De skal til at trampe og klappe. ”Hvem kan lide rap og techno?”, råber Rohan. ”Det kan jeg godt lide”, hvisker Mala, ”det er dejligt”.
Rohan and Mala have drums and a trumpet. They are going to stamp and clap. “Who likes rap and techno music?” shouts Rohan. “I like it,” whispers Mala. “It’s great.”

line.words: §Bonjour tout le monde,§ dit maman. §J’ai mal à la tête.§

subtitle.line: “Hoi allemaal,” zegt moeder. “Ik heb hoofdpijn.”
“Hello everybody,” say mum. “I have a headache.”
“Hello everybody,” say mum. “I have a headache.”
“Hello everybody,” say mum. “I have a headache.”
“Hola a todos”, dice mamá “tengo dolor de cabeza.”
“Hallo allesammen”, siger mor. ”Jeg har hovedpine”.
“Hello everybody,” say mum. “I have a headache.”
